Articles.Content:
I was wanting to do some Lunar bike rallying today with DMP. I currently run a 100 tick server and would love to trench race with anyone interested.

I already have Race Bikes ready to be used and teamspeak will be used for communication. Ip and other info (such as modified client) will be given upon connection to teamspeak.

Teamspeak: teamspeak.quelsolaar.com (this is not a dedicated ksp teamspeak, merely one that i hang out in that is there to be used)
